programme.title: First and Foremost Bureaucrats
programme.short_synopsis: Reports of pollution in the North Sea remind Alistair Cooke of a childhood fishing trip.
programme.medium_synopsis: A childhood fishing trip becomes more poignant to Alistair Cooke after discovering that the North Sea is falling victim to water pollution.
